hindi:
गुरु गोविंद दोऊ खड़े, काके लागूं पाय।
बलिहारी गुरु आपने, गोविंद दियो बताय।
english:
Guru Govind dou khade, kaake laagun paay.
Balihari guru aapne, Govind diyo bataay.
translation: Both Guru and God stand before me, whose feet should I touch first? I bow to my Guru who showed me the way to God.
